dict.acceptation: 极好的，精彩的，绝妙的；美妙；胜；神妙；

sent.orig: The party was wonderful.I had a wonderful time.
sent.trans: 这个派队太棒拉。我玩得很开心。

sent.orig: I know. He is wonderful, isn' t he? And he' s such a wonderful athlete.
sent.trans: 安：是的，他真好，不是吗？他还是优秀运动员。
噢，真是美极了，真是美极了！

sent.orig: The wonderful vase you sent should make a wonderful centerpiece on our tea table.
sent.trans: 你送的花瓶真棒，正好成为我们茶几中央最好的装饰品。

sent.orig: I thank you very much for your wonderful speech as well as the wonderful food.
sent.trans: 谢谢您绝妙的讲演和丰盛的食物。
